front.title: The HTTP header for the Platform for Privacy Preferences 1.0 (P3P1.0)

abstract.t: The Platform for Privacy Preferences 1.0[4] (P3P1.0) specificationdescribes how to associate a privacy policy with each URI request.Such associations are contained in a so-called policy referencefile. This draft describes a new HTTP response header whichindicates the location of such policy reference file. This header isintended to be a part of the P3P1.0 framework and should be treatedin the full context of the P3P1.0 specification[4].
